rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm surprised the Driver of the Heaven's Holy Grail
and his party are just a bunch of kids.

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, I'm not complaining or anything.
Just thought you all must have it pretty tough.

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0003
rows.name:
The Boss is worried about you lot, too.
There's no one here who thinks ill of you.

rows.label: tlk00340102_msg0004
rows.name:
As long as you're in Hr√¶svelgr,
feel free to relax and stretch your wings.
